description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - We are welcoming:
              
              + 03 System Analysts or Senior System Analysts for Hanoi Office.
              
              + 07 System Analysts or Senior System Analyst for Hochiminh Office.
              
              - Translate requirements defined by customer into logical, economical and practical system designs.
              
              - Analyze and design system flow and procedures to ensure high quality and efficient use of resources.
              
              - Prepare detailed design from which complete sets of programs will be written.
              
              - Review quality and delivery timeline.
              
              - Work with customer regarding to technical matters.
              
              - Coach the subordinates.
              
              - Report to Leader and Line Manager.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * In Hanoi:
              
              - Graduated from College or University majoring in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering or any other IT-related fields.
              
              - At least 5 years’ experience in Software Development Life Cycle and Quality assurance or Quality control.
              
              - Fluent in English.
              
              - Strong problem-solving skill, with a logical, analytical and approach to work
              
              - Good design documentation.
              
              - Team work and willing to learn a new technology, process and methodology.
              
              - Good in leadership, communication skill.
              
              - Able to work under high pressure.
              
              - Java Programming Language.
              
              - JavaScript/HTML/CSS is mandatory
              
              - Strong experience in SQL.
              
              - RDMBS (PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Oracle, etc.).
              
              - Understand the concept of OOP, MVC, OOAD, UML.
              

              * In Hochiminh:
              
              + Qualifications and experience:
              
              - Bachelor’s Degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering or any other IT-related fields.
              
              - 1 year experience level at least as System Analyst or technical team leader.
              
              - 5 years’ experience at least in Software Development Life Cycle.
              
              - Good at English.
              
              - Strong problem-solving skill, with a logical, analytical and approach to work.
              
              - Good design documentation.
              
              - Team work and willing to learn a new technology.
              
              - Good at leadership, communication skill.
              
              - Able to work under pressure.
              

              + Business application:
              
              - OS : Any kinds of recent version of Unix/Linux, Windows Server.
              
              - DBMS: Any major RDBMS skill would be plus (Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.).
              
              - Programming Language: Java/.NET(VB, C/C++, C#)/PHP.
              
              - Technology: Any kinds of J2EE, Struts, Spring, ORM framework, .NET Framework.
              
              - Strong working experience in OOP, OOAD, UML, MVC.
              
              - Strong experience of design and analyzing in IT solution.
              

              * Benefits for successful candidates:
              
              1. Salary: Competitive
              
              2. Beside NET salary, employee will get the bonus 2 times per year according to working performance periodically and company profit.
              
              3. Salary increment: 1 time per year.
              
              4. Professional working conditions.
              
              5. Support IT and Business Manner courses.
              
              6. Work off on Saturday and Sunday by weekly, public holidays according to Vietnam labor Law
              
              7. Company retreat: 1 time per year
              
              8. Take annual leave 16 days per year.
              
              9. Have a chance to work and study in Japan, APAC, India etc.,
              
              10. Premium Healt Care package for you and your family members.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Attractive salary and bonus.
               







                Premium Health Care plan for you and your beloved family members.
               







                Team building activities and sports clubs.
